description:
Brenda Wallace

In Aotearoa New Zealand the government ran an experiment to encode law openly as python, publish versioned in git, licenced as open source, and available on a hosted as an API.

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/when-software-and-law-are-the-same-thing

PyCon AU, the national Python Language conference, is on again this August in Sydney, at the International Convention Centre, Sydney, August 24 - 28 2018.

Video licence: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Python, PyCon, PyConAU

Sat Aug  3 14:50:00 2019 at Cockle Bay
title: When software and law are the same thing
